titleStmt.title: The brothers, a comedie, as it was acted at the private house in Black Fryers Written by James Shirley. Never printed before.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Humphrey Robinson at the Three Pigeons, and Humphrey Moseley at the Prince Armes in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
